name: Stackers
description:
In stackers, you use your perished characters as building blocks to progress through the levels. Once your character dies, you will respawn while your perished character stays in the scene.

Walkthrough: 

"Stackers" was made in under 24 hours as a submission for the Wowie 3 game jam
Theme: Failure is progress.

The music is from  www.bensound.com
